C39DE19EE7724743B8DABF028935AED7.description:
Examine cross-cultural similarities and differences in the products to
understand perspectives of the target culture(s) in the three modes at the
intermediate-mid range.

5F8A66FBF6FE4583BB907AD9E46E7919.description:
Examine cross-cultural similarities and differences in the practices to
understand perspectives of the target culture(s) in the three modes at the
intermediate-mid range.

56C6F26C83A84603B2D4C30C19B96025.description: Examine the significance of the similarities and differences between the target culture(s) and the student’s own culture.

D1A79C7E03B7413096517FDE382C0BD5.description:
Compare similarities in formal and informal requirements for language
between the target language and their language in the three modes at the
intermediate-mid range.

64D630ABB81F41DD859826901413B8FD.description:
Use knowledge of sound and writing systems in the target language to
better understand the student’s own language in the three modes at the
intermediate-mid range.

322BAD44C35D49CB8D1FB7080DEB417E.description:
Recognize how different time frames are expressed in the target language
in the three modes at the intermediate-mid range.

131B209121964421850432D85ADE1ECF.description:
Use appropriate idiomatic expressions in limited settings in the three
modes at the intermediate-mid range.

322C811D83414B5CB782E9E3B20B3889.description:
Compare similarities and differences in the target language and the
student’s own language in the three modes at the intermediate-mid range.

651BFF22A1B54B7EAB9B95B703E5698E.description: Examine the significance of the similarities and differences between the target language and the student’s own language.

628816097DFF4E97958586DA2332CC50.description:
Comparisons: Develop insight into the nature of
language and culture in order to interact with cultural competence.

A69B283F2BD54CF78B1F99AD50E27AAF.description:
Use authentic sources to explore the distinctive perspectives of the target
language and its cultures in the three modes at the intermediate-mid range.

FC06E11BB16C4FEE90CC9C3A73B8B843.description:
Research authentic target language sources, analyze the content, and
acquire unique information available only through the target language and
its cultures when using the three modes at the intermediate-low range.

39925496C3464886A421AD230FCD8DAE.description: Analyze information and viewpoints present in authentic resources.

C26547F92FB946E6999B827BB8F8E1C1.description:
Apply information gathered through target language resources to other
content areas in order to supplement learning when using the three modes
at the intermediate-mid range.

6F3B7954D703455290C170EE66159EFF.description:
Transfer and apply information and skills from other content areas to
experiences related to the target language and cultures when using the
three modes at the intermediate-mid range.

D89EA4F0F1524F2C802A99D30ACA1F6E.description: Analyze information gathered from target language resources connected to other content areas.

5AFE8A77B6B94A1D8263F44552680D24.description:
Connections: Connect with other disciplines and
acquire information and diverse perspectives in order to use the language
to function in academic and career-related situations.

999B52B1952443E19ACA8E3C8DDDC594.description:
Interact with others in and from another culture at a functional level in
some familiar contexts when using the target language in the three modes
at the intermediate-mid range.

F3DDA5CCF76B4CB9BC5DB5D4766F27D0.description:
Recognize that significant differences in behaviors exist among cultures, use
appropriate learned behaviors and avoid major social blunders when using
the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-mid range.

16FE3E1C67A9422A91D0D052F4043995.description:
Converse with peers from the target cultures in familiar situations at school,
work or play, and show interest in basic cultural similarities and differences
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-mid
range.

267A6F1249E14D57B0D5382EA94CCCEB.description:
Compare products related to everyday life and personal interests or studies
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-mid
range.

0ECF2228714A4158829969C25EE6B0CF.description: Examine and compare products to help understand perspectives in the target cultures and the student’s own.

227FF413A7FB43F1B6BB68E13CC049C1.description:
Interact with others in and from another culture at a functional level in
some familiar contexts when using the target language in the three modes
at the intermediate-mid range.

0DAF9CD0B13F48A38C966A651BC3A090.description:
Recognize that significant differences in behaviors exist among cultures, use
appropriate learned behaviors and avoid major social blunders when using
the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-mid range.

7F4C83C79F1E4E4B930774078758EF32.description:
Converse with peers from the target cultures in familiar situations at school,
work or play, and show interest in basic cultural similarities and differences
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-mid
range.

75BC9ADEB3B547FFA70DF1FEE9E48FF4.description:
Compare practices related to everyday life and personal interests or studies
when using the target language in the three modes at the intermediate-mid
range.

717200AFB27449508BDEFA937FCB0065.description: Examine and compare practices to help understand perspectives in the target cultures and the student’s own.

3EA45D1789DA4F2C8EF6A1FB71F039A9.description:
Cultures/Intercultural Communication:
Interact with cultural competence and understanding.

BB9A091964434E91908226E1F34A4F18.description:
Give straightforward presentations on a variety of familiar topics and some
concrete researched topics, using sentences and series of connected
sentences.

AF293DFBC03D4C3E8A249A671A3A4AEF.description:
State viewpoints about familiar topics and give some reasons to support
them, using sentences and series of connected sentences.

02DF2058A0CC4133B590CE57583907DB.description:
Tell a story about life, activities, events and other social experiences, using
sentences and series of connected sentences.

456E2B6953154D039BD3792CCC4EDB89.description:
Communicate information, make presentations and express thoughts about familiar topics, using sentences and some series of
connected sentences through spoken, written or signed language (presentational mode).

716A3C21FCD64895BE8E48F88F37B96B.description:
Identify the main idea and key information in short, straightforward
conversations, discussions and other sources.

9C056EE6F12947499EA3A0B25240DBAD.description:
Understand the main idea and key information in short, straightforward
fictional texts.

4C1134E124534ACEB647F2B14C7D93C2.description:
Understand the main idea and key information in short, straightforward
informational texts.

CCACD96E735840538CD3A1A909C4017C.description:
Understand the main idea and key information from sentences and some series of connected sentences within texts that are spoken,
written or signed on familiar topics (interpretive mode).

6DCEFC776E734AFD87A6D68375283190.description:
Exchange preferences, feelings or opinions and provide basic advice on a
variety of familiar topics, creating sentences and series of sentences and
asking a variety of follow-up questions.

6812DAE1F4A64829B7321065DA4AD684.description:
Interact with others to meet personal needs in a variety of familiar
situations creating sentences and series of sentences and asking a variety of
follow-up questions.

1650A5B4ABB54C89BD6900A1677DEAF5.description:
Exchange information in conversations on familiar topics and some
researched topics, creating sentences and series of sentences and asking a
variety of follow-up questions.

ADCEA318EB8A42D3BF588F491C7D693F.description:
Participate in spontaneous spoken, written or signed conversations on familiar topics, creating sentences and some series of connected
sentences to ask and answer a variety of questions (interpersonal mode).

C4CD6EE4B88C4F8BBABE544B131F92DC.description:
Communication: Communicate effectively in more than one
language in order to function in a variety of situations and for multiple purposes.
